attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of the item. This value will be contained within the onChange event

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The displayed value within the selection box. The value property is the fallback value.

attributes.name: filter
attributes.description: When true the dropdown will have the ability to filter options by typing into the input field.

attributes.name: mount
attributes.description: How newly added items will be added to the existing list
